doc:
Bob Dawson (television host) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Dawson_(television_host) 0 Robert "Bob" Dawson (May 9, 1924 – October 20, 2014) or "Sheriff Bob" was an American television personality, meteorologist, and producer. Dawson was famous for creating and hosting the children's television series Sheriff Bob, which featured his kind-hearted personality and direct connection to his young audiences. The program aired from 1954 until 1978. Robert_"_Bob_"_Dawson ( May_9_,_1924 – October_20_,_2014 ) or_"_Sheriff_Bob " was an_American_television_personality , meteorologist , and producer . Dawson was famous for creating_and_hosting the_children 's_television_series_Sheriff_Bob , which featured his_kind-hearted_personality and direct_connection to his_young_audiences . The_program aired from 1954 until 1978 .
